TopicTitle: Career mode save reverting to science save with contracts

Articles.Content:
I say science mode because everything is the same as that minus the fact I still seem to be able to get contracts. Essentially I just started a new game very recently, haven't even gone above 100 science, very few buildings upgraded. Now I reload and all my buildings are fully upgraded, I have no reputation bar at the top any more, the admin building is closed, but I still seem to be able to get contracts.

It's same problem as this, except I have no reputation bar and my admin building is closed.

I'm using 32bit KSP.

Edited February 1, 2015 by Halaberiel
